summary: Implements an Ignite handler that links a PyTorch learning‑rate scheduler to a MONAI training engine, automatically invoking the scheduler at appropriate training events (such as epoch completion or metric evaluation) and supporting both generic LRSchedulers and ReduceLROnPlateau.
business_intent: Streamline learning‑rate management in deep‑learning workflows, allowing users to integrate any PyTorch LR scheduler into MONAI training pipelines without manual bookkeeping, thus enhancing training efficiency, consistency, and model convergence.
